reviews.text: The fact that is old building we personally loved it. Well Thought engineered and planned hotel. The hotel has everything you need. Location is very well positioned right across from main train stations. you can even drop off your luggage at the receptionist for free and walk around all day long in the city hotel will also give you three days free pass on the public transportation.

This is a really standard business hotel that has no character or anything unique about it. It's not crappy but it's not beautiful. I booked a couple hours before arrival at a really peak point where there was almost no rooms available in the city. I paid for eur431 for a very small room with a single bed that smelled like cigarettes on the very back of the building. For me, the group should not have cost more than $40. I did however knowing Lee book the room and I am thankful that I had a roof over my head. The staff was professional but not memorable. When I complained about how much I paid and asked for a discount, they were not able to address me in any kind of nice way. They just changed the topics. On the other hand, it steps from the main station which was very convenient. The breakfast was huge and it was good. It was not the best one I ever had but it was definitely big with lots of choices. The bar was kind of cool looking and they had piano playing really late at night. I didn't want to go there in the beginning but when I came home at night from another place I read it that I didn't have a drink there just to enjoy the piano. There's a nice hotel near with a really nice bar a few doors down
Very solid classic hotel. Comfy bed, nice room but no a/c and poor ventilation. Great breakfast though, good service and excellent pool/spa with a water slide from 6th floor to 2nd.

Great location next to the train station, very good breakfast that is included, small but nice gym (I didn’t go to the pool). Small room with a sink that floods the bathroom. No AC. I like the retro 80’s-looking lounge/bar. Overall a good value.

Clean and quiet hotel right next to the Train station. Perfect service and staff at the Front desk is just great! The room card can be used for public transportation - it is very convenient. Breakfast was very delicious. I really recommend this hotel
